The Arabian Nights is one of my favourite books.

sentences.en: The city also has quaint neighborhoods such as Opa Locka, with its Arabian Nights architecture.
sentences.cn: 这个城市还有古雅的城镇,例如奥帕索和它的天方夜谭式的建筑风格.

sentences.en: The term "Arabian Gulf" has been in casual but inconsistent use by various members of the US navy and government, and by many Arab states, for a few decades now.
sentences.cn: 这一术语“阿拉伯湾”只是一个非正式的词汇，但它已经被美国海军各机构和美国政府，以及许多阿拉伯国家南腔北调的用了几十年。

sentences.en: These advertisements propaganda strange the Aladdin cave treasure house is more dazzling than Arabian Nights in.
sentences.cn: 这些广告宣传的奇异商品比天方夜谭中阿拉丁的山洞宝库更加琳琅满目.

sentences.en: This study of the old story collection < Arabian Night's Entertainment > based on narratives.
sentences.cn: 摘要作为举世公认的故事渊薮,《一千零一夜》用非哲学的方式,提供了最早的敍事哲学-“故事 ”.

sentences.en: Yes. The Arabian Nights is interesting, too.
sentences.cn: 有.《天方夜谭》也很有趣的.
